trans-unit.source: Learn about features in BizTalk Services editions | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Learn about features in BizTalk Services editions | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Compare the capabilities of the BizTalk Services editions: Free, Developer, Basic, Standard, and Premium. MABS, WABS.
trans-unit.target: Compare the capabilities of the BizTalk Services editions: Free, Developer, Basic, Standard, and Premium. MABS, WABS.

trans-unit.source: Azure BizTalk Services offers several editions.
trans-unit.target: Azure BizTalk Services offers several editions.

trans-unit.source: Use this article to determine which edition is right for your scenario and business needs.
trans-unit.target: Use this article to determine which edition is right for your scenario and business needs.

trans-unit.source: Can create and manage Hybrid Connections.
trans-unit.target: Can create and manage Hybrid Connections.

trans-unit.source: A Hybrid Connection is an easy way to connect an Azure website to an on-premises system, like SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: A Hybrid Connection is an easy way to connect an Azure website to an on-premises system, like SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: Includes Hybrid Connections, EAI and EDI message processing with an easy-to-use trading partner management portal, and support for common EDI schemas and rich EDI processing over X12 and AS2.
trans-unit.target: Includes Hybrid Connections, EAI and EDI message processing with an easy-to-use trading partner management portal, and support for common EDI schemas and rich EDI processing over X12 and AS2.

trans-unit.source: Can create common EAI scenarios connecting services in the cloud with any HTTP/S, REST, FTP, WCF and SFTP protocols to read and write messages.
trans-unit.target: Can create common EAI scenarios connecting services in the cloud with any HTTP/S, REST, FTP, WCF and SFTP protocols to read and write messages.

trans-unit.source: Utilize connectivity to on-premises LOB systems with ready-to-use SAP, Oracle eBusiness, Oracle DB, Siebel, and SQL Server adapters.
trans-unit.target: Utilize connectivity to on-premises LOB systems with ready-to-use SAP, Oracle eBusiness, Oracle DB, Siebel, and SQL Server adapters.

trans-unit.source: Use a developer centric environment with Visual Studio tools for easy development and deployment.
trans-unit.target: Use a developer centric environment with Visual Studio tools for easy development and deployment.

trans-unit.source: Limited to development and test purposes only with no Service Level Agreement (SLA).
trans-unit.target: Limited to development and test purposes only with no Service Level Agreement (SLA).

trans-unit.source: Includes most of the Developer capabilities with increases in Hybrid Connections, EAI bridges, EDI Agreements, and BizTalk Adapter Pack connections.
trans-unit.target: Includes most of the Developer capabilities with increases in Hybrid Connections, EAI bridges, EDI Agreements, and BizTalk Adapter Pack connections.

trans-unit.source: Also offers high availability, and the option to scale with a Service Level Agreement (SLA).
trans-unit.target: Also offers high availability, and the option to scale with a Service Level Agreement (SLA).

trans-unit.source: Includes all the Basic capabilities with increases in Hybrid Connections, EAI bridges, EDI Agreements, and BizTalk Adapter Pack connections.
trans-unit.target: Includes all the Basic capabilities with increases in Hybrid Connections, EAI bridges, EDI Agreements, and BizTalk Adapter Pack connections.

trans-unit.source: Also offers high availability, and the option to scale with a Service Level Agreement (SLA).
trans-unit.target: Also offers high availability, and the option to scale with a Service Level Agreement (SLA).

trans-unit.source: Includes all the Standard capabilities with increases in Hybrid Connections, EAI bridges, EDI Agreements, and BizTalk Adapter Pack connections.
trans-unit.target: Includes all the Standard capabilities with increases in Hybrid Connections, EAI bridges, EDI Agreements, and BizTalk Adapter Pack connections.

trans-unit.source: Also includes archiving, high availability, and the option to scale with a Service Level Agreement (SLA).
trans-unit.target: Also includes archiving, high availability, and the option to scale with a Service Level Agreement (SLA).

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the differences.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the differences.

trans-unit.source: Yes, in increments of 1 Basic unit
trans-unit.target: Yes, in increments of 1 Basic unit

trans-unit.source: Yes, in increments of 1 Standard unit
trans-unit.target: Yes, in increments of 1 Standard unit

trans-unit.source: Yes, in increments of 1 Premium unit
trans-unit.target: Yes, in increments of 1 Premium unit

trans-unit.source: Hybrid Connection Data Transfer (GB) per Unit
trans-unit.target: Hybrid Connection Data Transfer (GB) per Unit

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Adapter Service connections to on-premises LOB systems
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Adapter Service connections to on-premises LOB systems

trans-unit.source: Includes Non-repudiation of Receipt (NRR) and downloading tracked messages
trans-unit.target: Includes Non-repudiation of Receipt (NRR) and downloading tracked messages

trans-unit.source: Use of transforms, including custom XSLT
trans-unit.target: Use of transforms, including custom XSLT

trans-unit.source: For resiliency against hardware failures, High Availability implies having multiple VMs within a single BizTalk Unit.
trans-unit.target: For resiliency against hardware failures, High Availability implies having multiple VMs within a single BizTalk Unit.

trans-unit.source: A "unit" is the atomic level of an Azure BizTalk Services deployment.
trans-unit.target: A "unit" is the atomic level of an Azure BizTalk Services deployment.

trans-unit.source: Each edition comes with a unit that has different compute capacity and memory.
trans-unit.target: Each edition comes with a unit that has different compute capacity and memory.

trans-unit.source: For example, a Basic unit has more compute than Developer, Standard has more compute than Basic, and so on.
trans-unit.target: For example, a Basic unit has more compute than Developer, Standard has more compute than Basic, and so on.

trans-unit.source: When you scale a BizTalk Service, you scale in terms of units.
trans-unit.target: When you scale a BizTalk Service, you scale in terms of units.

trans-unit.source: What is the different between BizTalk Services and Azure BizTalk VM?
trans-unit.target: What is the different between BizTalk Services and Azure BizTalk VM?

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Services provides a true Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) architecture for building integration solutions in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Services provides a true Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) architecture for building integration solutions in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: With the PaaS model, you focus completely on the application logic and leave all of the infrastructure management to Microsoft, including:
trans-unit.target: With the PaaS model, you focus completely on the application logic and leave all of the infrastructure management to Microsoft, including:

trans-unit.source: No need to manage or patch virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: No need to manage or patch virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: You control scale on-demand by simply requesting more or less capacity through the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: You control scale on-demand by simply requesting more or less capacity through the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Server on Azure Virtual Machines provides an Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) architecture.
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Server on Azure Virtual Machines provides an Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) architecture.

trans-unit.source: You create virtual machines and configure them exactly like your on-premises environment, making it easier to run existing applications in the cloud with no code changes.
trans-unit.target: You create virtual machines and configure them exactly like your on-premises environment, making it easier to run existing applications in the cloud with no code changes.

trans-unit.source: With IaaS, you are still responsible for configuring the virtual machines, managing the virtual machines (for example, installing software and OS patches), and architecting the application for high availability.
trans-unit.target: With IaaS, you are still responsible for configuring the virtual machines, managing the virtual machines (for example, installing software and OS patches), and architecting the application for high availability.

trans-unit.source: If you are looking at building new integration solutions that minimize your infrastructure management effort, use BizTalk Services.
trans-unit.target: If you are looking at building new integration solutions that minimize your infrastructure management effort, use BizTalk Services.

trans-unit.source: If you are looking to quickly migrate your existing BizTalk solutions or looking for an on-demand environment to develop and test BizTalk Server applications, use BizTalk Server on an Azure Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: If you are looking to quickly migrate your existing BizTalk solutions or looking for an on-demand environment to develop and test BizTalk Server applications, use BizTalk Server on an Azure Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: What is the difference between BizTalk Adapter Service and Hybrid Connections?
trans-unit.target: What is the difference between BizTalk Adapter Service and Hybrid Connections?

trans-unit.source: The BizTalk Adapter Service is used by an Azure BizTalk Service.
trans-unit.target: The BizTalk Adapter Service is used by an Azure BizTalk Service.

trans-unit.source: The BizTalk Adapter Service uses the BizTalk Adapter Pack to connect to an on-premises Line of Business (LOB) system.
trans-unit.target: The BizTalk Adapter Service uses the BizTalk Adapter Pack to connect to an on-premises Line of Business (LOB) system.

trans-unit.source: A Hybrid Connection provides an easy and convenient way to connect Azure applications, like the Web Apps feature in Azure App Service and Azure Mobile Services, to an on-premises resource.
trans-unit.target: A Hybrid Connection provides an easy and convenient way to connect Azure applications, like the Web Apps feature in Azure App Service and Azure Mobile Services, to an on-premises resource.

trans-unit.source: What does "Hybrid Connection Data Transfer (GB) per unit" mean? Is this per minute/hour/day/week/month? What happens when the limit is reached?
trans-unit.target: What does "Hybrid Connection Data Transfer (GB) per unit" mean? Is this per minute/hour/day/week/month? What happens when the limit is reached?

trans-unit.source: The Hybrid Connection cost per unit depends on the BizTalk Services edition.
trans-unit.target: The Hybrid Connection cost per unit depends on the BizTalk Services edition.

trans-unit.source: Simply put, costs depend on how much data you transfer.
trans-unit.target: Simply put, costs depend on how much data you transfer.

trans-unit.source: For example, transferring 10 GB data daily costs less than transferring 100 GB daily.
trans-unit.target: For example, transferring 10 GB data daily costs less than transferring 100 GB daily.

trans-unit.source: Use the <link><linkText>Pricing Calculator</linkText><title></title></link> for BizTalk Services to determine specific costs.
trans-unit.target: Use the <link><linkText>Pricing Calculator</linkText><title></title></link> for BizTalk Services to determine specific costs.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the limits are enforced daily.
trans-unit.target: Typically, the limits are enforced daily.

trans-unit.source: If you exceed the limit, any overage is charged at the rate of $1 per GB.
trans-unit.target: If you exceed the limit, any overage is charged at the rate of $1 per GB.

trans-unit.source: When I create an agreement in BizTalk Services, why does the number of bridges go up by two instead of just one?
trans-unit.target: When I create an agreement in BizTalk Services, why does the number of bridges go up by two instead of just one?

trans-unit.source: Each agreement comprises of two different bridges: a send side communication bridge and a receive side communication bridge.
trans-unit.target: Each agreement comprises of two different bridges: a send side communication bridge and a receive side communication bridge.

trans-unit.source: What happens when I hit the quota limit on the number of bridges or agreements?
trans-unit.target: What happens when I hit the quota limit on the number of bridges or agreements?

trans-unit.source: You are not able to deploy any new bridges or create any new agreements.
trans-unit.target: You are not able to deploy any new bridges or create any new agreements.

trans-unit.source: To deploy more, you need to scale up to more units of the BizTalk service, or upgrade to a higher edition.
trans-unit.target: To deploy more, you need to scale up to more units of the BizTalk service, or upgrade to a higher edition.

trans-unit.source: How do I migrate from one tier of BizTalk Services to another?
trans-unit.target: How do I migrate from one tier of BizTalk Services to another?

trans-unit.source: Use the backup and restore flow for migrating from one tier to another.
trans-unit.target: Use the backup and restore flow for migrating from one tier to another.

trans-unit.source: Only some migration paths are supported.
trans-unit.target: Only some migration paths are supported.

trans-unit.source: Refer to <link><linkText>BizTalk Services: Backup and Restore</linkText><title></title></link> for more details about the supported migration paths.
trans-unit.target: Refer to <link><linkText>BizTalk Services: Backup and Restore</linkText><title></title></link> for more details about the supported migration paths.

trans-unit.source: Is the BizTalk Adapter Service included in the service? How do I receive the software?
trans-unit.target: Is the BizTalk Adapter Service included in the service? How do I receive the software?

trans-unit.source: Yes, the BizTalk Adapter Service with the BizTalk Adapter Pack are included with the Azure BizTalk Services SDK <link><linkText>download</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Yes, the BizTalk Adapter Service with the BizTalk Adapter Pack are included with the Azure BizTalk Services SDK <link><linkText>download</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: To create Azure BizTalk Services in the Azure portal, go to <link><linkText>BizTalk Services: Provisioning using the Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To create Azure BizTalk Services in the Azure portal, go to <link><linkText>BizTalk Services: Provisioning using the Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: To start creating applications, go to <link><linkText>Azure BizTalk Services</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To start creating applications, go to <link><linkText>Azure BizTalk Services</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>How do I Start Using the Azure BizTalk Services SDK</linkText><title></title></link><html></html>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>How do I Start Using the Azure BizTalk Services SDK</linkText><title></title></link><html></html>
